title: MARKET-ME.FR

meta.summary: The AgenceMe team (2 developers, 2 designers, 1 marketing) and I build a creative marketplace from scratch in 2 months.

body:
The Marketplace for Premium Design Resources. UI Kits, Icons, Presentations, Wordpress Theme & much more. ### Context I joined the agenceMe team for my first internship as a backend-developer developer. My mission was to build their own marketplace: www.market-me.fr/

. ![become seller](/medias/market-me-6.jpg) ![product page](/medias/market-me-13.png) ### Shipping stuff ðŸš€ The best part on this internship was the promotion of our website. We won several awards as shown below.

Site of the Day 10 September
MarketMe
By AgenceMe (France) https://t.co/GiKIkCkDbr pic.twitter.com/2oma2kIObW

— CSS Winner (@csswinner) 10 septembre 2016

SITE of the DAY: MarketMe https://t.co/YdU6eUtIyE @AgenceMe_Market pic.twitter.com/y9uh9FqxK0

— CSS Nectar (@cssnectar) 28 fÃ©vrier 2016
### Technical * Custom stripe integration. * Intercom integration. * jQuery. * MVC PHP framework: CodeIgniter. * Custom back office from scratch. * Complex graph with highcharts.js. * Custom analytics system from scratch. * Trending products detection algorithm. ![* stripe lightbox](/medias/market-me-7.jpg) ![ dashboard](/medias/market-me-12.jpg) ![Mobile](/medias/market-me-1.jpg)
